pageContext.claim: “'What will be disclosed is that there was no basis for these FISA Warrants, that the important information was kept from the court, there’s going to be a disproportionate influence of the (Fake) Dossier. Basically you have a counter terrorism tool used to spy on a presidential campaign, which is unprecedented in our history.' Congressman Peter King  Really bad things were happening, but they are now being exposed. Big stuff!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump promotes a quote from a member of Congress who is a loyal supporter. The FISA warrants were approved by a judge after receiving documentation from the Justice Department, and then were renewed three more times. That indicates the FBI could document that useful information was being obtained.
